title: Nekropolis
description: MATT RICHTER MAY BE DEAD, BUT HE'LL STILL CRACK THIS CASE.Meet Matt Richter. Private Eye. Zombie. His mean streets are the city of the dead, the shadowy realm known as Nekropolis.This place has always been ruled by the vampire overlords.Now they're plotting to destroy the city.... overÂ his dead body.More pulp than Pulp Fiction , more butt-kicking than Buffy, Nekropolis is the first in a deathly new series.File Urban Fantasy [ Zombie Detective | Undead City | Crime Overlord | Sexy Vampires ]
author: Tim Waggoner
